Enumeration# AudioResource.InputMode

iOS 13.0–16.3DeprecatediPadOS 13.0–16.3DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.0–16.3DeprecatedmacOS 10.15–13.3DeprecatedtvOS 26.0–26.0Deprecated

```
enum InputMode
```

Deprecated

Use the ChannelAudioComponent, AmbientAudioComponent, or SpatialAudioComponent instead.

## [Topics](/documentation/RealityKit/AudioResource/InputMode-swift.enum#topics)

### [Input modes](/documentation/RealityKit/AudioResource/InputMode-swift.enum#Input-modes)

[`case nonSpatial`](/documentation/realitykit/audioresource/inputmode-swift.enum/nonspatial)the input channels are mixed to whatever the output format is without any spatialization[`case spatial`](/documentation/realitykit/audioresource/inputmode-swift.enum/spatial)a spatialized with all degrees of freedom. This treats a resource as a mono stream so mixes all its channels to mono[`case ambient`](/documentation/realitykit/audioresource/inputmode-swift.enum/ambient)spatialized but ignores listener translation and only follows listener head rotation## [Relationships](/documentation/RealityKit/AudioResource/InputMode-swift.enum#relationships)

- [`Hashable`](/documentation/Swift/Hashable)
